cast.name: 提莎·坎贝尔-马丁 Tisha Campbell-Martin

director.name: 凡妮莎·帕里斯 Vanessa Parise

trans_title: 西蒙妮·拜尔斯的故事：勇往直前
introduction: "The Simone Biles Story: Courage to Soar" follows Simone Biles through the sacrifices and hard work that led her to win 19 Olympic & World Championship medals and ultimately cemented her stake as one of the greatest gymnasts of all time. Simone's journey from foster care to the Olympic podium - with all of its triumphs & heartbreaks - can serve as an inspiration for every little girl with a dream.
chinese_title: 西蒙妮·拜尔斯的故事：勇往直前
